title: Implement custom pattern parsing in DynamicKeyGenerator
description: Implement parsing of customPattern and generation of matching strings in src/lib/generator/dynamic-key-generator.ts.
close_reason: Implemented custom pattern parsing and generation in DynamicKeyGenerator using regex via json-schema-faker.

title: Implement stream-based validation in src/lib/validator
description: Refactor validateDocuments and SchemaValidator to support streaming documents instead of loading everything into an array, preventing OOM for large datasets.

title: Fix IPAddress format mapping in Synthesizer
description: The Synthesizer currently hardcodes IPAddress to ipv4 format. It should use both ipv4 and ipv6 depending on what was detected.

title: Fix performance bottleneck in document generation
description: The generate function redundantly preprocesses the entire schema for every document, causing severe performance issues when generating large datasets. Preprocessing (dynamic keys and array distributions) should be done once per batch or schema load.

title: Add unit tests for semantic detectors and synthesizer
description: Missing unit tests for src/lib/inferencer/semantic-detectors.ts and src/lib/synthesizer/index.ts.

title: Refactor mongodb-schema-wrapper.ts to reduce duplication
description: Extract common transformation logic used in both inferSchema and transformNestedFields into a single helper function.
close_reason: Refactored mongodb-schema-wrapper.ts to extract common transformation logic into helper functions.

title: Update XGenArrayLen to use frequency distribution directly
description: Refactor XGenArrayLen in src/lib/synthesizer/vendor-keywords.ts to use frequency distribution directly instead of min/max.
close_reason: Updated XGenArrayLen to use frequency distribution directly and improved sampling accuracy.

title: Implement CDC and Mutation Modes
close_reason: Completed all phases of implementation and verified with integration tests.

title: Verify Gemini CLI workflows in GitHub Actions environment
Ensure _id fields use realistic key formats
description: The _id field is often generated as a random string instead of an ObjectId or realistic key. The registerPathGenerator mechanism in custom-formats.ts is not integrated with json-schema-faker, and the Synthesizer only applies the 'objectid' format if the inferred type is ObjectID. We should ensure _id fields are prioritized for realistic key generation.

title: Standardize error handling across the codebase
Refactor DynamicKeyGenerator to use faker-engine
description: Reduce duplication by delegating value generation for dynamic keys to the central faker engine instead of re-implementing schema-to-value logic in generateValueFromSchema.

title: Make required field probability threshold configurable in Synthesizer
description: The 0.95 threshold for required fields is currently hardcoded. It should be configurable via SynthesizerOptions and CLI flags.
close_reason: Made required field probability threshold configurable in Synthesizer and CLI infer command.

title: Standardize ObjectID format across Synthesizer and Generator
description: Ensure consistency in how ObjectIDs are represented in JSON Schema (e.g., format: 'objectid') and how they are generated.

title: Investigate and remove potentially dead code serializeValidationReport
